bibl.title: The Hibeh Papyri. Part II (Nos 172-284).

series.title: Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No.

bibl.seg: Turner Eric G., with the Collaboration of Marie-Thérèse Lenger, The Hibeh Papyri. Part II (Nos 172-284). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. 32.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 1955, 8°, xiv-187 pp. et 4 pll.

C.R. par Vincenzo Arangio-Ruiz, AG 6e s., 19 (1956) pp. 152-155. - James Day, AJP 78 (1957) pp. 428-433. - Édouard des Places, Orientalia N.S., 25 (1956) pp. 315-316. - Naphtali Lewis, CP 53 (1958) pp. 41-43. - Willy Peremans, Gnomon 30 (1958) pp. 590-594. - Claire Préaux, ChrEg 31 (1956) No. 62, pp. 363-370. - B.R. Rees, CR N.S., 6 (1956) pp. 233-234. - Alfred Tomsin, Bulletin de l'Association des Classiques de l'Université de Liège 4 (1956) pp. 22-25. - Hans Julius Wolff, ZSav 73 (1956) pp. 392-400.
